entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
